text:
I have a strange issue:
• I have a developer trial account, on its last day of availability.
• In order to create this trial account, I made an app developer account to manage it.
• I can no longer find my app developer account to renew the trial and continue my work.
• I made a new app developer account with the same email, though I feel like I should've been unable to do so if an account already existed.
Did I perhaps delete this app developer account? I'm not sure, but I wanted to see if there was any way to renew the trial account, or link that account to my "new" app developer account.
